package.name: TrollPad
package.shortDescription: Troll SpringBoard into thinking it's running on iPadOS.

descriptionlist.description:
This tweak enables many iPadOS features on iPhone, including:
  • Floating dock
  • Floating keyboard
  • Grid app switcher
  • Multitasking button
  • Slide over
  • Split view
  • Stage Manager (including AirPlay as external display)
  • Upside down orientation
